blocks.bannerText:
Want to Join The Wellmi family? 
Looking for a career that let's you make a difference?

blocks.text: At Wellmi, we’re all about supporting people when and where they need it the most. If you want to work for one of the fastest growing wellbeing providers in the UK , while growing and developing personally and professionally, then Wellmi is the right place for you.
blocks.text1: We are currently looking for new people  to join us.

blocks.text: At Wellmi, we love our people and we want everyone to feel loved and make the most of your career here. That’s why we support every aspect of your physical and mental well-being with our core values.

point1.title: Be Happy
point1.text: We approach life in a positive and optimistic way

point2.title: Breathe
point2.text: Life is for living and enjoying.

point3.title: Meet Great People
point3.text: The tapestry of life is rich with diversity.

blocks.headingText: We Believe In Flexible Work Lives.
blocks.text: A few snaps from some of our amazing Wellmi Family.

blocks.headingText: Want to become part of the family?
blocks.text: See a range of available positions below. Use the Arrows to select one before submitting a CV. We can’t wait to hear from you.

Didn't find a position that suits you? 
We would still love to hear from you! Perhaps the right role for you is just around the corner.
